participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, nurturing, and passionate about education.
participant_1.background: I enjoy dressing up for art events and to show my daughter how to have fun with fashion. I am a married woman who is struggling in my women's studies class but is happy with her life. I like to design jewelry to relax. When I'm stressed, I overeat. I am a passionate educator who enjoys bringing the joy of learning to life in my students.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Adventurous, artistic, and dedicated to personal growth.
participant_2.background: I've been with my girlfriend Luis for almost a year. My favorite food is a burger. I'm looking for a place to live that is close to the Y so I can continue my swimming routine. I listen to death metal. I'm constantly making short films with the camcorder my parents got me.

content.text: Hi, I'm a teacher and I love art! How about you?
Hello! My girlfriend and I love going to art events.  My favorite food is a good burger.  How about you?
That's fun! I like to dress up for art events and show my daughter how to have fun with fashion. What kind of work do you do?
I'm currently looking for a place to live that is close to the Y so I can continue my swimming routine. What are you up to today?

I'm doing some jewelry design to relax. I'm stressed out about my women's studies class. I'm a passionate educator who enjoys bringing the joy of learning to life in my students. What do you like to do to relax?
I like to listen to death metal or make short films with the camcorder my parents got me. I'm constantly making short films.  What do you enjoy doing in your spare time?
I like to spend time with my daughter, design jewelry, and go to art events. I'm looking forward to my daughter's first art show next month. What are you looking forward to?
I'm looking forward to swimming at the Y and spending time with my girlfriend Luis
